formattedAddress: 237 W 13th St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 237 W 13th St, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text:
Super Adorable Shop and Extremely Friendly and Knowledgeable Staff. Called first to see if they had Blue Lotus Flower Essential Oil which is not at all easy to find in pure high grade quality form. They indeed carry the Oil and I asked the gentleman that answered if he could explain what Absolute was which he did without hesitation. THANK YOU! Blue Lotus Flower Essential Oil is a Super Expensive Oil due to the Flowers Delicate Nature, Blooming Frequency and the amount of Flowers that need to be processed for 1oz of Oil.  More importantly it is the Highest Frequency Oil in the Essential Oil Realm not Surprisingly Coveted By Egyptian Royalty ü§´ ‚ÄúOf Course‚Äù üòâ this Oil Enhances Your Sexual Drive and Lucid Dreaming in addition to other wonders.

They only had 2ml & 10ml +. 10ml was going to be well over $300. I really wanted 5ml and was so disappointed but I thought let me ask if they can make me a 5ml from the 10. I thought for sure they‚Äôd say no I‚Äôm sorry we can‚Äôt do that but without hesitation the wonderful woman in the back said Sure, I can do that!

Well, I paid approximately $195 for 5ml of this Magic Oil and I have been unable to stop smelling it since. Worth Every Penny!! The aroma of Cherries üçí and Earth is transcendental. The quality of this Oil from this Little Diamond of a Shop is Beyond Glorious. I cannot wait to make my special Oil Blend for my Face and Body.

Thank you thank you for stocking this Gold and Helping my Personal Blend come to LIFE!!!

originalText.text: Lovely shop! The Amber oil blend is the realist thing in nyc! Also the only place I've found Green Hojari in this entire town... Hell yes!

text.text: Lovely shop! The Amber oil blend is the realist thing in nyc! Also the only place I've found Green Hojari in this entire town... Hell yes!

originalText.text:
visit the store for the first time today and bought a roll-on perfume.
The store is cute and well located but after using the product I got I felt that the essential oil fade very fast and perfume disappears immediately. Probably too diluted.
A pity.

originalText.text: The best quality frankincense I've ever come across! Their resin and oils are 100% pure!

text.text: The best quality frankincense I've ever come across! Their resin and oils are 100% pure!

originalText.text: I've been going the Enfluerage NYC for almost 20 years, starting back in their original location deeper in the village. They have always provided essential oils that often rival the therapeutic quality of young living while being competitively priced! They have rare-to-find oils (Blue Lotus this past summer & violet leaves from upstate!) I know for certain they sell REAL ESSENTIAL OILS because I still have a bottle of Petti Grain Sur Fleur from my first visit there and it is still perfect! Sometimes the clerks may come across as cold but honestly... you try dealing with the public in NYC all day every day see how you do. They are always polite though & the more you go the deeper your relationship with them gets. What matters is that they are super experienced & have a sincere & profound knowledge & love of/for plants, oils & all that goes with that. The perfumes are actually really "natural" which is basically non existent in the world. I only know of one other company making TRULY NATURAL & SAFE perfumes. To be able to go in & get properly informed assistance & fantastic oils is a God send! I'm back in New Mexico now but I still order from them on the regular to make my professional grade skin care & healing fragrances. The packaging is gorgeous as well! Love this shop & the customer service!
